entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
